title: Here’s What Was on the Agenda for the N.F.L. Owners’ Meeting
description: Owners of the league’s teams met to discuss N.F.L. business, including the payment of a $790 million settlement over the Rams’ relocation.
dc:creator: Ken Belson, Jenny Vrentas and Tripp Mickle
media:credit: Tim Heitman/USA Today Sports, via Reuters
media:description: In a statement on Tuesday, a Washington Commanders representative said Daniel Snyder had no intention of selling the team.
